title: *PATREON PREVIEW* The Transitive Property of Ass (Corona War Room Edition) Pt. II with Foster Kamer
description:
The drinks are flowing and things are loosening up inside the war room for the Patreon-exclusive part 2 of Throwing Fits’ emergency Coronavirus podcast with Futurism’s Foster Kamer. Topics, highlights and educational information includes, but is not limited to: ESPN Zone, a tribute to Las Vegas, how to gamble, being back in the mix as a writer, bong movies vs. Bong movies, the science of digestible science, an open letter to Emily Oberg, ambitions as an East Coast Media Elite™, Jared Leto being a loser, Trump vs. Soylent, socialism 2020, journalism and love in the time of corona, and dying on the timeline.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
